name: nutify
tagline: A lightweight local notification and alerting service
description: Nutify is a lightweight alert and activity push notification tool for local networks. It supports HTTP-based triggers and offers a minimal web-based UI for confirming, snoozing, or tracking alerts.

features.title: Nutrition Tracking
features.description: Track daily food intake and nutritional values

features.title: Food Database
features.description: Search and select foods from a built-in database

features.title: Meal Logging
features.description: Log meals by date and time

features.title: Nutrition Summaries
features.description: View daily and weekly nutrient summaries

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage nutrition data through a browser

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the tracker on your own infrastructure
